00018  class Sender;
00019  class Reciver;

00022 namespace mt {
00023 namespace smpp {
00024 
00025 class ServerProcessor: public Processor {
00026 
00027         std::map<std::string, ClientConnection*> clients;
00028         Mutex clientsMtx;
00029 
00030         void SendData(Data* data);
00031         std::string GetCurrentClientsInfo();
00032 
00033         static void* ConnectionsMonitor(void* p);
00034         CodecPtr m_codecFromUCS2;
00035 public:
00036 
00037         void runLoop();
00038         int GetMessage(Data* data);
00039 
00040         virtual ~ServerProcessor() {
00041         }
00042 
00043         ClientConnection* GetClient(std::string sysId) {
00044                 ClientConnection* con = NULL;
00045                 AutoMutex a(clientsMtx);
00046                 std::map<std::string, ClientConnection*>::iterator it = clients.find(
00047                                 sysId);
00048                 if (it != clients.end()) {
00049                         con = it->second;
00050                 }
00051                 return con;
00052         }
00053 
00054         int RegisterClient(std::string sysId, ClientConnection* clnt) {
00055                 AutoMutex a(clientsMtx);
00056                 std::map<std::string, ClientConnection*>::iterator it = clients.find(
00057                                 sysId);
00058                 if (it == clients.end()) {
00059                         clients[sysId] = clnt;
00060                         return 0;
00061                 }
00062                 MT_LOGERROR("client with system id '"<< sysId<<"' already connected!")
00063                 return -1;
00064         }
00065 
00066         void UnRegisterClient(std::string sysId) {
00067                 AutoMutex a(clientsMtx);
00068 
00069                 std::map<std::string, ClientConnection*>::iterator it = clients.find(
00070                                 sysId);
00071                 if (it != clients.end()) {
00072                         clients.erase(it);
00073                 } else {
00074                         MT_LOGERROR("no connected client with system id " <<sysId)
00075                 }
00076         }
00077 
00078         ServerProcessor() :
00079                 Processor() {
00080                 MT_LOGINIT(ServerProcessor)
00081 
00082         }
00083 
00084 };
00085 
00086 }
00087 }
